text:
Since Tomcat 7.0.70 the behaviour of getRequestURI has changed, this was done to fix https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=59317.

Applications that are depending on this behaviour (as this was consistent across other servlet containers) have now broken, see https://issues.alfresco.com/jira/browse/MNT-16664 and http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13556 for two examples.

A configuration option was hinted at in the mailing list (http://markmail.org/message/jwm5ip245empcghi#query:+page:1+mid:pxweasg3n5qr4rce+state:results), this issue report is a formal request for such a configuration option.
creator: gavin.cornwell@alfresco.com
